1.title: Episode #2.1

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Teddy Wilson and Norm Sousa return with their unique approach to home improvement projects and household chores; moving a bathtub upstairs; a new spin on a lazy susan; a mobile hot tub with a pickup truck.

2.title: Episode #2.2

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: The dangers of woodworking at home; how to cut the grass faster; inflating a giant bouncy castle indoors; building a couch boat.

3.title: Episode #2.3

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: White water rafting with a swimming pool; defrosting a fridge with thermite; the great canoe race; remote control a life-sized boat.

4.title: Episode #2.4

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Making a medley of snacks and hot chocolate with a washer and dryer; do-it-yourself tennis machine. Playing with big guns and propane tanks; monster Crème brûlée.

5.title: Episode #2.5

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: The lawn sprinkler bbq cook off; house painting with a lawn mower; chemistry in the kitchen: sugar vs artificial sweetener rockets; how not to gas a boat.

6.title: Episode #2.6

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Teddy and Norm find an innovative way to change truck tires without a jack; reinventing the game of darts; convert chimney to smoke house; opening safes the destructive way.

7.title: Episode #2.7

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Ted and Norm discover why you shouldn't mess with an oxygen tank; an easier way to portage a canoe; the dangers of methane gas. Using bacon to cut through metal!

8.title: Episode #2.8

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Making a skylight; building an indoor ice rink; creative ways of getting rid of a bug problem; how dangerous paint fumes can be.

9.title: Episode #2.9

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Making the back-breaking work of unloading the groceries a thing of the past; the practicality of vacuum sealing; the dangers of spontaneous combustion.

10.title: Episode #2.10

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: A new way to detail a truck; why you should never play with matches; building a giant deep fryer; a faster, better way to put up holiday lights.

11.title: Episode #2.11

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Making popcorn with Teddy's car hood. Springing patio furniture with air bags from cars. The dangers of DIY solar paneling.

12.title: Episode #2.12

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Teddy and Norm want an outdoor patio for the second floor. The supreme powers of thermoplastic polycarbonate. Saying goodbye to the house Never Ever style.

13.title: Episode #2.13

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot:

1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Wilson and Sousa test common household warnings by doing exactly what each warning says not to do. They set off fireworks indoors, build and use a walk-in microwave oven, and toss a propane-filled cooking canister into a fire.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Wilson & Sousa ignore the "never play with your food" warning & test which foods are most flammable. They also test "never play baseball indoors" "never cook eggs in their shell in the microwave" & "never play with electricity."

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Hosts Teddy Wilson and Norm Sousa experiment with rockets to speed up the slow process of drying laundry, try cooking with space heaters, play indoor golf and demonstrate why deep-frying frozen foods is a bad idea.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Hosts Norm Sousa and Teddy Wilson try heating a bottle of champagne in the microwave, use chemistry to add a sunroof to Teddy's car and wager on which is the more crafty vermin: indoor mice or outdoor raccoons?

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Hosts Teddy Wilson and Norm Sousa discover why driving with open gasoline containers in the back of the car is a no-no. Also: how to keep a barbecue lit in the rain and why overfilling your waterbed is a bad idea.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Host Norm Sousa and Teddy Wilson find out why explosives are rarely used in cooking or interior design. Plus, a full-size remote control car puts Norm in the back seat with Teddy at the wheel.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Rainy day boredom inspires hosts Teddy Wilson and Norm Sousa to try indoor target practice with a crossbow and indoor grilling with a charcoal barbecue. They also discover why propane-filled balloons aren't as fun as they sound.

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Hosts Norm Sousa & Teddy Wilson play with fire - first in a race to light a fuse without a match, then trying to light candles from across the living room. They also find out why firefighters are really scared of oxygen fires.

9.title: Episode #1.9

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Hosts Teddy Wilson & Norm Sousa learn why overinflating tires isn't wise, experiment with explosives again for a home reno project, and attempt to move furniture with dry ice. Plus, is beer flowing from the faucets possible?

10.title: Episode #1.10

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Hosts Norm Sousa and Teddy Wilson try gardening with explosives, build a DIY home alarm, and discover that the fastest way to move a piano isn't necessarily the best. Plus, a fiery twist is added to the sport of indoor bowling.

11.title: Episode #1.11

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Hosts Wilson & Sousa invent a dangerous new way to cook using cooking spray, try out destructive new ways to win a food fight & find a very messy new way to whip cream. Also: why you should never, ever mix water and hot oil.

12.title: Episode #1.12

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Hosts Norm Sousa and Teddy Wilson attempt to build an in-ground hot tub with explosives, use glow sticks to try and create the world's biggest night light, and attempt to remove an entire exterior wall of the house.

13.title: Episode #1.13

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Hosts Sousa & Wilson add an explosive twist to skeet shooting, try to invent a faster way to paint a room, & in their final experiment of the season, learn why you should never, ever introduce a spark when you smell a gas leak.

14.title: After the Mayhem

episode of.title: Never Ever Do This at Home (TV Series 2013– )

14.plot:

imdb.title: Never Ever Do This at Home
plot: Mixing science, danger and comedy, Teddy Wilson and Norm Sousa conduct madcap experiments to test home safety. They mix, ignite, flood, and wreak havoc at home to reveal the science behind their experiments...with outrageous consequences.
